issue.message: It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
Unnecessary; `SDK_INT` is always >= 24
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `FirebaseFirestore` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
